## Correlogram

```{r}
library(corrplot)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

dataP<-read_excel("/Users/e5028514/Downloads/Equity group analysis.xlsx")%>%select(-1)
rownames(dataP)<-colnames(dataP)

corrplot(as.matrix(dataP), is.corr = FALSE, 
         tl.pos='lt', 
        # order = 'AOE', 
         col = COL2('RdBu', 10),
         diag=TRUE,
         type = 'full',
        cl.pos = 'n',
        tl.cex = 0.8)

```
